children.name: Test defects
TC713-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[@text = "Sorry! You do not have access to this conversation."]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC713 - To verify proper error message is thrown if user edits the private permalink and tries accessing the same.
TC756-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.TextView[@text = "Sorry! You do not have access to this conversation."]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC756 - To verify the if the app will show a restricted page stating that the user does not have access to the conversation.
TC716-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("~addToSM") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC716 - To verify user is able to create a  Public Permalink  if "SM or UG configuration allow users to create public permalink.
TC718-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Compose"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC718 - To verify user is able to send out the "Public Permalink" as "Reply/Reply All/Forward/Notes"
TC719-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Add a note"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC719 - To verify "Public Permalink" shared is accessible to user part of same SM.
TC720-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Add a note"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC720 - To verify Non-SM user is able to access the public permalink shared.
TC721-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("~addToSM") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC721 - To verify the creation of a public permalink is reflected in the activity panel.
TC758-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("//android.widget.EditText[@text = "Add a note"]") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC758 - To verify if user clicks on the "Public Permalink", he/she taken to the webpage even if the app is installed.
TC694-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("~addToSM") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC694 - To verify the link, refresh and delete icon is visible/present once after the public permalink generated
TC689-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("(//android.view.ViewGroup[@resource-id = "permalinkRefresh"])") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC689 - To verify user should be able to refresh an existing public permalink
TC695-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("(//android.view.ViewGroup[@resource-id = "permalinkRefresh"])") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC695 - To verify creates and updates of a public permalink should be reflected in the activity panel
TC696-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("~addToSM") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC696 - To verify the first name of the SM member who is created the public permalink is displayed below the popup modal
TC697-Failed-->Reason: Error: element ("~addToSM") still not displayed after 10000ms
TC697 - To verify the first name of the SM member who is created the public permalink is displayed below the popup modal
